info.description:
Welcome to the RaaS® API â€“ with this RESTful API you can integrate a global reward or incentive program into your app or platform.

This console works in our Sandbox environment. To receive your own credentials or to ask questions, please contact us at devsupport@tangocard.com.
info.title: Tango Card RaaS API

get.summary: Get a list of Accounts created on this Platform.
Get details for a specific Account on this Platform.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: identifier

get.summary: Get all items in the Platform's Catalog.

parameters.name: verbose
parameters.description: Verbose payload

parameters.name: criteria
parameters.description:
customerIdentifier - specify the customer associated with the credit card. Must be the customer the accountIdentifier is associated with.

accountIdentifier - specify the account this credit card is associated with

creditCardToken - specify the credit card token to fund with

amount - specify the amount to fund in USD

get.summary: Get details for a specific Credit Card Deposit.

parameters.name: depositId
parameters.description: Credit card deposit identifier returned in Deposit response payload

parameters.name: criteria
parameters.description:
customerIdentifier - specify the customer associated with the credit card. Must be the customer the accountIdentifier is associated with.

accountIdentifier - specify the account this credit card is associated with

creditCardToken - specify the credit card token to unregister

get.summary: List all credit cards registered on this Platform.

parameters.name: showInactive
parameters.description: Show inactive cards

parameters.name: creditCardCriteria
parameters.description:
customerIdentifier - specify the customer associated with the credit card. Must be the customer the accountIdentifier is associated with.

accountIdentifier - specify the account this credit card is associated with

label - specify a label for the credit card

ipAddress - specify the The IP address of the person adding the credit card

creditCard - number - specify the account this order will be deducted from

creditCard - expiration - specify the card expiration date in YYYY-MM format

creditCard - verificationNumber - specify the 3 or 4-digit card security code on back of card (CVV2, CVC2, or CID)

billingAddress - firstName - specify the billing address first name

billingAddress - lastName - specify the billing address last name

billingAddress - addressLine1 - specify the billing address line 1

billingAddress - addressLine2 - Optional. Specify the billing address line 2

billingAddress - city - specify the billing address city

billingAddress - state - specify the billing address state

billingAddress - postalCode - specify the billing address postal code

billingAddress - country - specify the billing address 2-letter country code

billingAddress - emailAddress - specify the billing address email

contactInformation - fullName - Optional. Used for email receipts. Specify the contact full name.

contactInformation - emailAddress - Optional. Used for email receipts. Specify the contact email address.

get.summary: Get details for a specific Credit Card.

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Credit card token

get.summary: Get a list of all Customers on this Platform.

post.summary: Create a new Customer on this Platform.

parameters.name: form
parameters.description:
displayName - a friendly name for this customer

customerIdentifier - an official identifier for this customer. This identifier needs to be lowercase if alphabetic characters are used.

get.summary: Get details for a specific Customer on this Platform.

parameters.name: customerIdentifier
parameters.description: customerIdentifier

get.summary: Get a list of all Accounts created for a specific Customer on this Platform.

parameters.name: customerIdentifier
parameters.description: customerIdentifier

post.summary: Create an Account under a specific Customer on this Platform.

parameters.name: customerIdentifier
parameters.description: The customerIdentifier for the Customer under which you are creating a new account

parameters.name: accountCriteria
parameters.description:
contactEmail - An email address for a designated representative for this account.

displayName - A friendly name for this account

identifier - A unique identifier for this account. This identifier must be lowercase if alphabetic characters are used.

get.summary: Get a list of all Email Templates on this Platform.

parameters.name: elementsPerBlock
parameters.description: specify the number of elements in a block.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: specify the page number to return.

parameters.name: createEmailTemplateCriteria
parameters.description:
name - A unique name to give the template.

fromName - The name that will appear in the From line of the email.

subject - The Subject of the email.

headerImage - A Base64 encoded string of an image that will show as the header of the email.

headerImageAltText - The Alt Text for the Header Image in the email.

accentColor - A Hex color value, six hexadecimal digits preceded by a pound sign, used as an accent in the email.

messageBody - The message body for the email. This is often used to let the recipient know why they have received the reward.

closing - After the reward credential, a space to close the message to the recipient

customerServiceMessage - (Optional) If left null, Tango Card's Customer Support contact information will be included. Otherwise contact information for your customer support, if you are taking responsibility for providing first tier customer support of your recipients.

accessControl - (Optional) Which Customers and/or Accounts should have access to this template.

accessControl - type - The type of access being specified: PLATFORM, CUSTOMER or ACCOUNT.

accessControl - identifier - If the type is PLATFORM, the platform name or can be left blank. If the type is CUSTOMER OR ACCOUNT, the customerIdentifier or the accountIdentifier, respectively.

defaults - If you want this template to be used at order time for the given Platform, Customer or Account when the Email Template Identifier (etid) is not provided with the order.

defaults - type - The type of default being specified: PLATFORM, CUSTOMER or ACCOUNT.

defaults - identifier - If the type is PLATFORM, the platform name or can be left blank. If the type is CUSTOMER OR ACCOUNT, the customerIdentifier or the accountIdentifier, respectively.

get.summary: Get details for a specific Email Template on this Platform.

parameters.name: etid
parameters.description: Email Template Identifier (ETID) is returned in the email template response payload

delete.summary: Delete a specific Email Template on this Platform.

parameters.name: etid
parameters.description: Email Template Identifier (ETID) is returned in the email template response payload

patch.summary: Update details for a specific Email Template on this Platform.

parameters.name: etid
parameters.description: Email Template Identifier (ETID) is returned in the email template response payload

parameters.name: updateEmailTemplateCriteria
parameters.description:
name - (Optional) A unique name to give the template.

fromName - (Optional) The name that will appear in the From line of the email.

subject - (Optional) The Subject of the email.

headerImage - (Optional) A Base64 encoded string of an image that will show as the header of the email.

headerImageAltText - (Optional) The Alt Text for the Header Image in the email.

accentColor - (Optional) A Hex color value, six hexadecimal digits preceded by a pound sign, used as an accent in the email.

messageBody - (Optional) The message body for the email. This is often used to let the recipient know why they have received the reward.

closing - (Optional) After the reward credential, a space to close the message to the recipient

customerServiceMessage - (Optional) If left null, Tango Card's Customer Support contact information will be included. Otherwise contact information for your customer support, if you are taking responsibility for providing first tier customer support of your recipients.

accessControl - (Optional) Which Customers and/or Accounts should have access to this template.

accessControl - type - The type of access being specified: PLATFORM, CUSTOMER or ACCOUNT.

accessControl - identifier - If the type is PLATFORM, the platform name or can be left blank. If the type is CUSTOMER OR ACCOUNT, the customerIdentifier or the accountIdentifier, respectively.

defaults - If you want this template to be used at order time for the given Platform, Customer or Account when the Email Template Identifier (etid) is not provided with the order.

defaults - type - The type of default being specified: PLATFORM, CUSTOMER or ACCOUNT.

defaults - identifier - If the type is PLATFORM, the platform name or can be left blank. If the type is CUSTOMER OR ACCOUNT, the customerIdentifier or the accountIdentifier, respectively.

get.summary: Get a list of exchange rates.
Get a list of Orders placed under this Platform.

parameters.name: accountIdentifier
parameters.description: specify the account to be queried.

parameters.name: customerIdentifier
parameters.description: specify the customer to be queried

parameters.name: externalRefID
parameters.description: specify the external reference ID to be queried

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: specify the starting date or date time to be queried according to RFC 3339, i.e. "2016-01-01" or "2016-01-01T00:00:00Z". See https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3339.txt

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: specify the ending date or date time to be queried according to RFC 3339, i.e. "2016-01-01" or "2016-01-01T00:00:00Z". See https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3339.txt

parameters.name: elementsPerBlock
parameters.description: specify the number of elements in a block.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: specify the page number to return.

post.summary: Create an Order under a specific Account.

parameters.name: createOrderCriteria
parameters.description:
accountIdentifier - specify the account this order will be deducted from

amount - specify the face value of of the reward. Always required, including for fixed value items.

campaign - optional campaign that may be used to administratively categorize a specific order.

customerIdentifier - specify the customer associated with the order. Must be the customer the accountIdentifier is associated with.

emailSubject - Optional. If not specified, a default email subject will be used for the specified reward.

externalRefID - Optional. Idempotenent field that can be used for client-side order cross reference and prevent accidental order duplication. Will be returned in order response, order details, and order history.

message - optional gift message

recipient - email - required if sendEmail is true

recipient - firstName - required if sendEmail is true (100 character max)

recipient - lastName - always optional (100 character max)

sendEmail - should Tango Card send the email to the recipient?

sender - firstName - always optional (100 character max)

sender - lastName - always optional (100 character max)

sender - email - always optional

utid - the unique identifier for the reward you are sending as provided in the Get Catalog call

etid - Optional. The unique identifier for the email template you would like to use. Only applicable if sendEmail is true.

notes - Optional order notes (up to 150 characters)

get.summary: Get details for a specific Order.

parameters.name: referenceOrderID
parameters.description: Reference order ID is returned in the order response payload

parameters.name: referenceOrderID
parameters.description: Reference order ID is returned in the order response payload

parameters.name: orderResendCriteria
parameters.description: newEmail - A new email to resend this order to.

items.description: List of Items associated with this Brand

brands.description: List of Brands inside of this Catalog

amount.description: The amount in USD to fund

createdDate.description: Date the credit card deposit was created

feePercent.description: Fee percent charged for credit card processing

referenceDepositID.description: Credit Card Deposit order reference ID

status.description: Status of the credit card deposit

createdDate.description: Date the credit card was un-registered

message.description: Friendly message that the credit card has been un-registered successfully

activationDate.description: Date when the the credit card will be activated for use in funding

contactInformation.description: List of contact information for funding confirmation emails

createdDate.description: Date the credit card was created

expirationDate.description: Expiration date of the registered card in YYYY-MM format

lastFourDigits.description: Last four digits of the registered credit card

accounts.description: List of Accounts this Customer has

emailTemplates.description: Email Template elements for the current page

orders.description: Order elements for the current page

newEmail.description: Optional new email address for resending an order to

credentials.description: Credentials as a map with String label key and credential value String

elementsPerBlock.description: Total number of elements per page

resultCount.description: Total number of elements in the current page

email.description: Email address that the resend was sent to

legacyId.description: Legacy ID (only when resending v1 orders)
